body: PLEASE HELP! How do I invite players to the tournament? I have some new members and they wanna be in the tournament, but they can't accept the invite to the tournament because they don't have one. Is it because registration closed?
body_tagged: PLEASE HELP! How do I invite players to the tournament? I have some new members and they wanna be in the tournament, but they can't accept the invite to the tournament because they don't have one. Is it because registration closed?
title: Tournament Help!

replies.body:
Don't think you can manually re-register you team, because registration has closed... but Pel invited Fort players so maybe he can do the same for you.

I heard there was only 8 teams playing, not 16. :(

So...^^^
